## ğŸš€ Getting Started

### 1ï¸âƒ£ Clone the repository

```bash
git clone https://github.com/azehagowa-creator/com.elparadisogonzalo.app.git
cd your-repo
```

### 2ï¸âƒ£ Install dependencies

```bash
npm install
```

### 3ï¸âƒ£ Configure environment variables

Create a `.env` file in the root directory:

```
PORT=3000
API_KEY=your_api_key
DATABASE_URL=https://elparadisogonzalo.com.app
```

### 4ï¸âƒ£ Start development server
```bash
npm run production 
```---
